[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Private Timeout] Does DkgPrivateGather timeout continue if dkg_threshold met? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [DKG End Timeout] Does DkgEndGather timeout have threshold check, or must all signers respond? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Nonce Timeout] When nonce timeout fires, are waiting signers correctly marked as malicious? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Sig Share Timeout] When sig share timeout fires, does coordinator correctly retry with new nonces? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Malicious Key Count] Does compute_num_key_ids() correctly sum keys for given signer_ids? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Insufficient Signers] After marking signers malicious, is remaining threshold check correct? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Wait Set Updates] When signer responds, is it removed from both dkg_wait_signer_ids and message_nonces wait sets? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Message Nonce Lookup] Can message_nonces.get(&self.message) fail if message was changed? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Iteration Increment] When retrying signing after timeout, is sign_iter_id incremented correctly? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Public Shares Check] Does check_public_shares() validate Schnorr proofs correctly? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Private Shares Decryption] Are private shares decrypted with correct KEX keys? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Shared Secret Computation] Does make_shared_secret_from_key() use correct Diffie-Hellman? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Share Validation] Are decrypted private shares validated against public commitments? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [Loop Processing] In process_message(), can infinite loop occur if state changes but never returns? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [State Preconditions] Does each state have clear preconditions that are checked before entering? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [State Postconditions] Does each state guarantee postconditions when exiting to next state? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [Idle Entry] Can coordinator enter Idle state with incomplete protocol state (e.g., partial DKG)? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [Multiple Packets] Does processing multiple packets in same state lead to inconsistency? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [State Recovery] After error, can coordinator recover to valid state or is reset required? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [Concurrent State Access] If coordinator is cloned, can two instances interfere with protocol? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Keys per Signer] Can num_keys % num_signers be non-zero, causing uneven key distribution? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Large Values] Can very large num_keys (e.g., 10000) cause performance DoS? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Timeout Values] Can timeout durations be set to u64::MAX microseconds, causing integer overflow? Low severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Public Keys Consistency] Must public_keys.key_ids.len() == num_keys? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Signer ID Range] Are signer_ids required to be in [0, num_signers)? High severity.
